group_1.textLeft: Yuna, I just heard.
You did an excellent job as the Student Council@President, right?

group_1.textRight: Yes, Senpai, all thanks to you.

group_1.textLeft: No, it was all your merit.
...You know, I actually have something for you@today.
Yes, for your accomplishment in attending to Juri.
And I know it's a little late for this, but...
I guess you could call it a celebratory gift...for your@inauguration as the Student Council President.
Here you go.

group_1.narration: ―Senpai―@To tell you the truth, I was the Student Council President@of another school until just a short while ago.
―Senpai―@This fountain pen is the one I used back then,@and it holds a very special place in my heart.
―Yuna―@You're giving me such a precious possession...?
―Senpai―@It's because it's so important that I'm entrusting it to you, Yuna.

group_1.textLeft: I went to a prep school, so I didn't become Student@Council President until my high school second year...
When I first became President, I had the same@problems as you.
No one knows what the right answer is.
Sometimes I got at odds with the teachers.
And as to what I was even working so hard for...
There were times when I lost sight of that, and@gave myself up to despair.
Are you surprised?

group_1.textRight: ...I am. You never seemed like that kind@of person...

group_1.textLeft: Hmhm.
Yuna, I feel you're like me in some ways.
...Not that I wanted to say this after telling you@all that, you know...
But, listen...
There may come a time, Yuna,
when you too will feel so much compassion for@others that you start to hate or resent someone else.
And you will find yourself consumed by anger.
When those times come, remember these words...

group_1.narration: "Don't hate,@don't be jealous, and don't be selfish.@Always work hard for others, and pray for peace,@both of the world and of your own heart."

group_1.textLeft: That's all I can tell you, Yuna.
I'm sure you can do it.
If you continue to work hard for the sake of@others,
I'm confident that people will all come to follow@your lead.
And you'll naturally be able to reach solutions@without leaving any lasting grudges.

group_1.textRight: I will never forget those words, Senpai.
Together with this fountain pen, I will cherish@them forever...!
(For everyone at school, and for everyone in@Futatsugi City.)
With my life on the line, I will protect them all.
